domain.name: Person

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category

text: @CNNPolitics Trump's running the #COVID19 National response, as if it were one of his casinos. This is about where he declares bankruptcy with the creditors left to clean up the mess. "Running government like a business" Trump edition.
